Type.description: The type of the repeating invoice.

Contact.description: Information about the contact associated with the repeating invoice.

Schedule.description: Details of the schedule for the repeating invoice.

Unit.description: The unit of time used in the repeating invoice schedule.

DueDateType.description: The type of due date used in the repeating invoice.

StartDate.description: The start date of the repeating invoice schedule.

DueDate.description: The due date for the repeating invoice.

EndDate.description: The end date of the repeating invoice schedule.

NextScheduledDate.description: The next scheduled date for the repeating invoice.

Period.description: The period between repeating invoice occurrences.

LineItems.description: The line items included in the repeating invoice.

items.description: Details of each individual line item.

LineAmountTypes.description: The type of line amounts used in the repeating invoice.

Reference.description: Reference information associated with the repeating invoice.

BrandingThemeID.description: The unique identifier for the branding theme associated with the repeating invoice.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code for the currency used in the repeating invoice.

Status.description: The status of the repeating invoice.

SubTotal.description: The subtotal amount for the repeating invoice.

TotalTax.description: The total tax amount for the repeating invoice.

TotalDiscount.description: The total discount amount for the repeating invoice.

Total.description: The total amount for the repeating invoice.

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: The unique identifier for the repeating invoice.

HasAttachments.description: Flag indicating if the repeating invoice has any attachments.

ID.description: The unique identifier for the repeating invoice.
